title: "How an Indian student made Sanskrit’s ‘language machine’ work for the first time in 2,500 years"
excerpt: "The discovery makes it possible to ‘derive’ any Sanskrit word – to construct millions of grammatically correct words including ‘mantra’ and ‘guru’ – using Pāṇini’s revered ‘language machine’ which is widely considered to be one of the greatest intellectual achievements in history."
